STATE
v.
Torrey GRADY 179A14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 7, 2018 Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina Luke M. Everett, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorneys at Law, for Grady, Torrey Dale Christopher A. Brook, Legal Director, for American Civil Liberties Union Foundation, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of October 2018 by American Civil Liberties Union Foundation and American Civil Liberties Union of North Carolina Legal Foundation for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of November 2018."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
